english.segment1: Get me through, through tonight. Just a taste, let it be sleepless nights. You and me, eyes are wide. Out of line, I'm alive. Right now , we'll get through this. We always do, try to drive
english.segment2: All the doubt, from my mind. Sit here and suck it up. And leave the day behind
english.segment3: I'm nothing but tired. I'm nothing at all. I'm nothing but broken. I'm ready to fall
english.segment4: Comfort and confidence. I am bound. This is the only thing I can feel. Something to guide me here. This will be all that I ask of you. It's all I pray when will I. Get that my life. Is not something that means a thing. I've blown it all away
english.segment5: I'm nothing but tired. I'm nothing at all. I'm nothing but broken. I'm ready to fall
english.segment6: I turn to you. I burn for you (x2)
english.segment7: I'm nothing but tired. I'm nothing at all. I'm nothing but broken. I'm ready to fall
